## common package

Collection of common utility types and functions.

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [casify(str, config)](./common.casify.md) | Transform casing of a string, for example from kebab-case to camelCase |
|  [deepmerge(objects)](./common.deepmerge.md) | Deep merge objects |
|  [err(err)](./common.err.md) | Construct an Err |
|  [isErr(result)](./common.iserr.md) | Check if a Result is of variant Err |
|  [isOk(result)](./common.isok.md) | Check if a Result is of variant Ok |
|  [ok(value)](./common.ok.md) | Construct an Ok |
|  [shuffle(array)](./common.shuffle.md) | Randomly shuffle an array using Fisher-Yates (aka Knuth) algorithm. |
|  [slugify(text)](./common.slugify.md) | Slugify a string |
